aPlusContent.title: Product description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product description
Explore A Toy for Your Kids 
Children can learn from matching games. It is ideal for toddlers to cultivate fine motor skills, visual cognitive skills, and hand-eye coordination. 
Lace and Trace Activity Set - 5 Wooden Panels and 5 Matching Laces 
Lace and Trace Activity Set - 5 Wooden Panels and 5 Matching Laces 
Explore A Toy for Your Kids 
A great gift for toddlers and preschoolers for hands-on, screen-free play. Parents still can use this lacing toy to engage in conversations with their child as they explore and make discoveries. 
LACE AND TRACE – This wooden set contains 5 double-sided lacing panels and 5 color-coordinated laces, it’s ideal to practice fine motor skills and fun geometric lacing. 
EARLY DEVELOPMENT – Develops hand-eye coordination, improves attention and encourages matching and sorting. 
FUN COLORS – Bright colors and beautiful artwork help toddlers learn and identify shapes and colors in a play-to-learn way. 
IDEAL GIFT – Lacing wooden cards is a great gift for kids aged 3 and up. Add lacing cards to your choices as a fun gift for a birthday or other special occasion. 
Support Kids' Early Development 
Cognition (color, shape, animal) 
Fine Motor Skill 
Concentration 
Structural Thinking 
Imagination

title: Montessori Wooden-Lacing Cards, Fine Motor Skills, Cute Bear Lacing Cards (Forest)
inStockText: This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.                     This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.
breadCrumbs: Arts, Crafts & Sewing > Crafting > Woodcrafts > Unfinished Wood
features: Explore Nature Through Play: Introduce them to forest wonders with four beautifully illustrated wooden lacing cards featuring a red mushroom, squirrel, pine tree, and bear. These nature-themed designs spark curiosity and storytelling as they connect with woodland animals and plants in a hands-on way. Whether used during a forest unit or as a calming, quiet-time activity, this set brings outdoor charm to indoor play.

Build Essential Fine Motor Skills: Threading the laces through each hole isn’t just fun—it’s a valuable way to improve fine motor coordination, pincer grip, and hand-eye precision. Perfect for toddlers and preschoolers, this activity helps build foundational skills that support early writing and daily tasks like tying shoes and buttoning clothes, all while encouraging patience and concentration.

High-Quality Materials: Each lacing card is crafted from sturdy, eco-friendly plywood with smooth edges for safe play. The set includes eight soft laces—two of each color: red, green, yellow, and white—durable and easy for little hands to manage. Vibrant, non-toxic prints capture the whimsical forest theme while ensuring long-lasting use in home or classroom settings.

Great Gift for Little Nature Lovers: Looking for a unique, thoughtful gift for toddlers or preschoolers? These lacing cards make a perfect choice! Ideal for birthdays, forest-themed parties, Montessori shelves, or learning centers, they offer a tactile, engaging experience that’s both educational and entertaining. It’s a toy that grows with them and inspires a lifelong love for nature.

Montessori-Inspired Independent Play: Following Montessori principles, this open-ended activity encourages self-guided learning and quiet concentration. They can work independently to lace at their own pace, enhancing confidence and problem-solving as they complete each card. It’s a calming, screen-free alternative to digital play that promotes focus and creativity in little learners.

attributes.key: Item dimensions L x W x H

attributes.value: Four wooden lacing cards, eight soft laces (two red, two green, two yellow, two white)

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Great quality & value Easter lacing cards
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I ordered this Wooden Lacing Card set for my classroom, and it arrived quickly. I was very pleased with the quality of the set, which includes four well made wooden lacing cards in different shapes along with several long laces.The craftsmanship is durable and thoughtfully designed. Crafted from high quality plywood, this Montessori inspired lacing set is smooth, sturdy, and safe for a child’s hands. The shapes include a chick, a bunny, and two eggs, all made from solid wooden boards that resist bending and breaking. This durability makes the set ideal for repeated use during our classroom work cycle or quiet time activities. I also appreciate the eco-friendly materials, which add to its value without compromising learning or longevity.This set strongly supports fine motor skill development and coordination. It encourages hand-eye coordination, dexterity, and precise finger control. The wooden cards are perfectly sized for young children to hold, and the evenly spaced holes guide the lacing process, helping strengthen small muscle movements. As students work through the bunny, chick, and egg designs, they build confidence by completing each pattern independently.I would highly recommend this set to parents, caregivers, and fellow teachers. The quality is excellent, and the four different shapes make it a great value and a wonderful addition to any learning environment.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2026

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Sturdy.  Our grandchildren love them!
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Good points first. The materials are great quality for the price.  The plywood cards are quite smooth, no slivers.  The pictures on the cards are appealing and fun.  As a bonus, I received two extra laces.Where this product doesn't excel is in use.  The shoelaces are simply too long to use comfortably.  I generally find card lacing rather calming, but I found myself frustrated by the miles and miles of lace that I had to pull through each hole.  The holes are also confusing.  Because the product is wood, the holes are, necessarily, farther apart than cardboard lacing cards.  There were holes at different points on the design and I was confused about where to go next.  Not that it matters.  I mean, it's a lacing card.Now, my kids weren't bothered by the placement of the holes or the length of the laces.  That was just me.  I included a picture of the cards all laced up by my children.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2026

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Grandkids enjoy playing with this. Great for hand eye coordination.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: As a preschool teacher these lace up cards are a wonderful addition to my classroom!These Easter inspired lacing shapes are of exceptional quality. They are made from strong, sturdy wood, polished smoothly without any rough areas. No fear of splinters and snapping in two. The shapes are large enough for little hands to hold.The colors of the “cards” are pretty pastels reminiscent of spring time and the Easter season. The laces are long enough to “sew” each shape completely. Even then, you receive more than enough laces, two of each of the colors pink, blue and white. I appreciate the ends of each lace having long aglets (the plastic ends). This helps with eye hand coordination and lessens the frustration they sometimes cause.Overall, I cannot say anything negative about these lace up/sewing cards. They are extremely durable and I anticipate them being used for many years in my classroom. I highly recommend these for home or school. They would be a wonderful addition to an Easter basket as well!
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2026

title: Stephen Joseph Lacing Cards, Dino
inStockText: Only 16 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games > Games & Accessories > Card Games > Standard Playing Card Decks

items.title: Safety Information
items.text: Warning: Choking Hazard – Small Parts. Not for children under 3 years. Long cord. Strangulation hazard.

description: Let's get lacing with a set of Stephen Joseph lacing cards. Here's some no-strings-attached fun for your child, a pack of five gorgeously themed cards with holes all around the outside. First get your little one to match the string to the coordinating card, and then let them lace away it's a great way to tie up fun with learning as they test hand-eye coordination and color matching skills together. Mom and dad might even get roped in to play.
features: Lace

IMAGINATIVE DESIGNS: Creative characters and unique designs make these interactive cards extra fun for kids. Your child is sure to find a set they love! Don't forget to match it with other coordinating Stephen Joseph products!
SPECIAL FEATURES: Five double-sided lacing cards and coordinating laces give your child everything they need to keep themselves busy playing. Each set includes a zipper bag for easy storage, too!

HIGH QUALITY: Cardboard pieces and polyester laces are made to withstand hours of play and are small and light for easy travel. Each card measures 6"x 6" (15.2cm x 15.2cm) and is perfect for little hands to hold.
INCLUDES: 5 themed cards, 5 coordinating strings, and a zipper bag for easy storage.
MATERIAL & CARE: Cardboard lacing cards with polyester cords. Cards must be spot-clean only.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I bought these for my 6 yo granddaughter who had asked me to teach her to sew.  She liked these very much.  The sewing with the tip of the cord was fun for her.  She did all of them!  They are very easy to put down when she got fidgety and could come back to them without a problem. Would recommend as a gift. These cards are worth the money.  You can take the cord out many times and "sew" them again.  Still have them and they are still in good shape.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: My 3 and 5 year old love these. They’re very cute and well made. Great quality. It’s a good fidget toy that keeps my kids hands busy. title: Springtime Lacing Cards for Kids 12 Packs Sewing Kits Rainbow Flower Butterfly Cardboard Sewing Cards Lacing Games for Developing Imagination School Learning Activity Supplies Spring Decorations
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games > Arts & Crafts > Craft Kits > Sewing
features: ❀Springtime themed sewing cards kits: the lacing cards includes 12 different Spring themed cardboard and 12 pieces of colorful lacing rope. The lacing kit is suitable for school supplies or lacing games for boys and girls.

❀Lacing cards size: The lacing card is about 6 x 6 inches, perfect for kids to sewing and lacing, the holes of each spring cutout are big enough for boys and girls to learn to lacing or sewing by themselves.

❀Double sides sewing kit: Lacing cards cute springtime unique design, Flower, butterfly, bird, bee, ladybug, frog, snail, sun, rainbow, tree, mushroom, worm, Cute spring insect and spring themed item with vivid color printing! Perfect lacing cards for kids to do as a school learning activity or DIY crafts.

❀Springtime holiday supplies: Made of thick cardstock, not easy to bend or break. smooth edges, which is suit for your boys and girls to practice fine motor skills. the rope is long enough that can different ways to lacing it.

❀DIY craft kit: Let's find the fun from these cute springtime lacing cards after lacing the craft kits! Boys and girls will be attracted by these cute and colorful spring items patterns! It is also fit for different occasions, as party decor supplies, preschool supplies, or as family game, DIY crafts. school activity playing games. Can be used as daily DIY lacing crafts for home, school, or for a small gifts!

title: S&S Worldwide Jumbo Lacing Cards, Pack of 6
inStockText: Only 16 left in stock (more on the way).
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games > Games & Accessories > Card Games > Standard Playing Card Decks
description: Help redevelop and improve hand-eye coordination with captivating photo images of familiar animal pets that are sure to resonate with people facing memory loss. Designed for easy grasping, the jumbo 6" x 8" cards can also be used as story or reminiscence starters and are made of a durable plastic so they're easy to clean. Perfect for people who previously enjoyed handiwork or prefer hands-on activities. Includes six cards, laces with plastic tips to allow for easier lacing and instructions.

title: ZAUGONTW 12 Pcs Lacing Cards for Kids, Sea Animals Sewing Cards with 12 Colorful Laces, Thicken Double Sided Lacing Playing Games for Children Developing Imagination Education Supplies
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games > Arts & Crafts > Craft Kits > Sewing
features: 【Sea Animals Lacing Cards Set 】You will get 12 pieces of sea animal lacing cards and 12 pieces of colorful laces.These card with bright colors and cute designs, which can be freely mixed and matched with marine animal cards.
【Promotes Fine Motor Skills】 Our kids lacing cards with sewing cards provide an excellent activity for developing children's hand-eye coordination, finger dexterity and other fine motor skills.

【Sturdy and Reusable】Our sewing games cards are made of quality cardboard, which is reliable and not easy to break, safe for body health, with comfortable touch.The laces are made of quality polyester, which is not simple to break, and can serve you for a long time.

【Cute Sea Creatures Patterns】These sea animal lacing cards feature a variety of patterns, including sea turtle, octopus, hermit crab, shark, blue whale,starfish, coral and other lovely animals. The patterns on cards are colorful, big and vibrant.
【Great Gift Idea】Our Kids Lacing Cards with Sewing Cards make a great gift for any child. They are perfect for birthdays, holidays, or any special occasion.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: The grandchildren were very interested in the sewing cards. In fact they worked until all of the cards had been completed. The next day they were very excited to realize that we could take all of the yarn out and they could do it all over again. Santa brought me a kit for Christmas when I was about six and it was exciting to see that the kids enjoyed them as much as I did.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Very nice!

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Great item to keep feet still and hands busy.  Very brightly colored sea creature stitching cards with durable brightly colored cords.  For my 3 year-old granddaughter I found it easier to pre-poke the holes for her to keep from getting  discouraged,  but for an older child,  that's probably not necessary.  The cards are stiff, but could be a little  stiffer in my opinion.  Very happy with purchase.  Love to see her joy of accomplishment!
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: My 6 year old kid was always interested in sewing, and thiskit was safe and perfect for learning to do so.The colorful sea animals are big and have many kinds, andthe thread is thick enough to be used by little children.The ends of the threads have plastic wrap around, so they come throughthe punching holes easily without plastic needles.Also, after finishing sewing they can be hung on the wallas kid's room decoration.The fish and different shells are all both sides printed and laminated.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2024

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I thought these would be made out of wood or something semi-sturdy...but they are just laminated cardboard borderline paper. Pretty disappointed. They also come with every single hole only half way punched out, so you have to go through and pop out every little circle which makes a big mess and it's just annoying.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2024

title: SpriteGru 9 Pieces Kids Lacing Cards, Double Sided Vehicle Sewing Cards with 9 Colorful Laces, Imagination Development Lacing Toys Games for Children Educational and Learning Activity
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games > Arts & Crafts > Craft Kits > Sewing
features: Multiple Skills Development: The lacing card is designed to develop lacing and sewing skills; children can get diverse skills while they play the cards. It is an ideal educational toy to develop kids' hand-eye coordination, sequencing, dexterity, imagination, and motor skills. And learn to tie shoelaces in advance.

Value Pack: It comes with 9 vibrant lacing cards with 9 colorful laces, sufficient quantity to meet multiple kids’ needs. Small and simple toys make your educational game more interesting. Play and enjoy the endless fun with your whole family!

Premium Material: The lacing cards are made of sturdy cardstock, durable and handy. Double-sided printed with premium plant ink, non-toxic, and with no odd smell, safe enough for toddlers’ use. The laces are made of quality polyester, which is not easy to break, and can serve you for a long time.

Bright-colored & Eye-catching: The pattern covers different vehicles, like a submarine, a plane, a train, a helicopter, a car, a rocket, and more. The patterns on the cards are colorful, vivid, and vibrant. The pre-punched holes are easy for preschoolers to work with. The strings are easy for children to use and fit into the holes easily.

Ideal Gifts: This set can be used as a toy game for children at home, a DIY art craft project for teachers in class, and a beautiful and interesting house decoration with these laces for your place. This is very beneficial to exercise children's hand-eye coordination, and bright colors can attract children's attention and make them more focused. A must-have piece for each family.

productPageReviews.username: Practical Picks: Reviews You Can Trust
productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Surprisingly Engaging & Kids Absolutely Love It!
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: For some reason, this simple set has completely captured my kids' attention, and I am not complaining! The 26-piece lacing card set comes with sturdy, double-sided uppercase letter cards and colorful laces, which makes it both fun and educational.It has quickly become a go-to activity in our home. The kids enjoy lacing and re-lacing the cards, and it keeps them engaged for long periods of time. I appreciate that it is not only entertaining, but also helps with fine motor skills and letter recognition.The quality is solid, the cards are durable, and the bright colors make it even more appealing. Overall, this has turned out to be a great purchase and a pleasant surprise. Highly recommended for preschoolers or early learners.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: These farm-themed lacing cards are such a great find! I’d say they’re perfect for ages 3 to 6, depending on fine motor skills. The cards are thick, sturdy, and well laminated, so they hold up well even with daily use. The strings are the right length and easy for little fingers to thread, making them perfect for practicing coordination and patience.I love that they’re double-sided with bright, colorful pictures that keep kids interested. The variety of farm animals and shapes keeps the activity fun and engaging. For the price, it’s a great value as you get several cards that can be reused over and over again.Highly recommend for preschoolers or kindergarteners learning fine motor skills or doing quiet-time activities! My 5 year old loves them!

title: SpriteGru 9 PCS Kids Lacing Cards, 9 Double Sided Farm Animals Sewing Cards with 9 Colorful Laces, Educational & Learning Toys for Preschoolers, Kids Ages 3+
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games > Baby & Toddler Toys > Early Development & Activity Toys
features: Value Pack: It comes with 9 vibrant lacing cards with 9 colorful laces, sufficient quantity to meet multiple kids’ needs. Small and simple toys make your educational game more interesting. Play and enjoy the endless fun with your whole family!

Double-Sided Printing: Each card features an adorable cartoon animal illustration on the front, which is attractive and eye-catching for kids. On the back of the card, there is a real photograph of this animal and some informative text about it, providing its interesting facts, such as its habitat, diet, behaviors, etc. Its name in different languages promotes cultural appreciation and language learning

Premium Material: The lacing cards are made of sturdy cardstock, durable and handy. Printed with premium plant ink, non-toxic and no odd smell, safe enough for toddlers’ use. The laces are made of quality polyester, which is not simple to break, and can serve you for a long time.

Cute Patterns & Smart Designs: The pattern covers diverse farm animals, like cow, duck, rooster, hen, owl, sheep, monkey, frog and horse. The illustrations on cards are big, vivid and vibrant. The holes are clearly cut and easy for preschoolers to work with. The strings are easy for children to use and fit into the holes easily.

Multiple Skills Development: This set can be used as a toy game, a DIY art craft project for kids at home and school, an excellent house decoration with these laces for your place. It is an ideal educational toy to help kids get to know different animals, develop their hand-eye coordination, sequencing, dexterity, imagination and motor skills. And learn to tie shoelaces in advance. A must-have piece for each family

items.text: In 2015, our family welcomed a precious child named Gru. We cherish him deeply and envision a childhood filled with families’ company, joyful play and engaging learning experiences. Inspired by our little one, we established a brand new product line, aptly named SpriteGru. We strive to ensure that each product is safe, fun, and durable. Our hope is to extend the love we have for our own child to every child who uses SpriteGru’s products.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: The boards are a great sturdy quality along with good strong laces, easy for little hands, nice vibrant designs on both sides and most importantly fun and educational for the kids!
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2025

productPageReviews.username: Practical Picks: Reviews You Can Trust
productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Surprisingly Engaging & Kids Absolutely Love It!
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: For some reason, this simple set has completely captured my kids' attention, and I am not complaining! The 26-piece lacing card set comes with sturdy, double-sided uppercase letter cards and colorful laces, which makes it both fun and educational.It has quickly become a go-to activity in our home. The kids enjoy lacing and re-lacing the cards, and it keeps them engaged for long periods of time. I appreciate that it is not only entertaining, but also helps with fine motor skills and letter recognition.The quality is solid, the cards are durable, and the bright colors make it even more appealing. Overall, this has turned out to be a great purchase and a pleasant surprise. Highly recommended for preschoolers or early learners.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2025

productPageReviews.username: Good Coffee + Good Book = Perfect Day
productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Sturdy, Colorful, Quality Product + Fun For Kids = Win/Win/Win/Win
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: These are well-made, sturdy, and a great size for little hands and fingers to learn lacing and eye-hand coordination in a fun way.  The colors are vivid and the holes are the perfect size for ease of lacing with the laces provided.  Great value for the price point.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Quality material.  Big enough to hold on one hand.  Vibrant colors.  The lacing holes are just the right size.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: These farm-themed lacing cards are such a great find! I’d say they’re perfect for ages 3 to 6, depending on fine motor skills. The cards are thick, sturdy, and well laminated, so they hold up well even with daily use. The strings are the right length and easy for little fingers to thread, making them perfect for practicing coordination and patience.I love that they’re double-sided with bright, colorful pictures that keep kids interested. The variety of farm animals and shapes keeps the activity fun and engaging. For the price, it’s a great value as you get several cards that can be reused over and over again.Highly recommend for preschoolers or kindergarteners learning fine motor skills or doing quiet-time activities! My 5 year old loves them!
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2025
